Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model.turnstates

Class MoveState

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.turnstates.MoveState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TurnState
    public class MoveState
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurnState
    This class represents the first action of the Turn. It could either represent a regular move or the use of a starting god power
